title: Eco-Luxe Gir Forest Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Bordering Gir National Park - home to the elusive Asiatic lion - and nestled amid an eight-acre mango orchard, Woods at Sasan is an eco-luxe escape perfect for families and couples alike. Enjoy a stay in nature, cradled in the lap of luxury, at this secluded Gujarat retreat on the edge of the Gir Forest.

This sustainable haven boasts handcrafted spaces, farm-to-table dining, unmatched hospitality, contemporary luxuries and a unique ambience. A retreat that strives to bring the outside in, Woods at Sasan celebrates its surroundings through open spaces and nature-inspired accommodation.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin every morning with buffet breakfast at Terracotta
- End every night with buffet dinner at Terracotta

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free on existing bedding with breakfast included.
offer_address: Gir Forest, Sasan-Talala Hwy, Sasan, Gujarat 362135
